##### May 07, 2022 - 2 Council Places & Mayor

![Election Notice 2021-2](https://www.cityofprimera.us/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/Election-Notice-2021-2-scaled-p4sd0me9i61dzgiwx4dnllbgl2fftji4ooci7ylmww.jpg "Election Notice 2021-2")

### SAMPLE BALLOT

“Sample ballots must be printed on yellow paper, per Texas law, to be allowed inside polling locations. Voters may download and print sample ballots onto yellow paper, or pick up sample ballots at City Hall.”

[![](https://www.cityofprimera.us/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/YELLOW.SAMPLEBALLOT.05012021-2-300x233.jpg)](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1yELlLjBj5IUpRtB_Xm4C4NW1G2ni9RSX/view?usp=sharing)
